about_the_game:
Anubis, the god of the underworld, is now in the ancient Egypt by the order of the god RA. Its first goal is to destroy the army of the god Seth in order to stop his power. However, Seth has built a powerful army of ancient desert monsters. The gigantic monsters in this army have the power to kill even gods. God Anubis will become stronger by defeating these monsters and capturing the desert fire.

In the demo version of the Anubis game, Anubis has begun to confront the powerful army of God Seth. This part of the game consists of different stages and in each stage Anubis will encounter different giant monsters and destroy them. God Seth's most trusted soldiers such as Giant mummies, scorpions, snakes, want it to be destroyed by confronting Anubis. Of course, our character Anubis will destroy all these enemies and absorb their power. In this journey of Anubis, God RA will also guide Anubis by sending giant fireballs from the sky along the way. In this journey, Anubis will finally confront God Seth's most powerful weapon, God-Slayer giant monster. In addition, Anubis will become stronger along this path and gain new combat features.

MAIN FEATURES:

* Starting a New Adventure: Experience adventures as the God Anubis reaches ancient Egypt.

* Exploration: Explore mysterious puzzles, deadly mazes and caves in the Ancient Desert.

* Gain Mystical Abilities: Gain magical powers and solve puzzles.

* Huge Deadly Creatures: Fight deadly desert monsters from the ancient world.

* Survive: Destroy God Seth's army and find the desert fire.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains mild violence, hit and break, and only fights with yellow blood on the player character. There are also enemy characters including mummies, snakes, skeletons, scorpions, and various creatures. The age limit for players is +16.
The game does not include sexual acts or extreme violence. Moreover, the topic of game does not involve sexual assault/non-consensual sex, BDSM, drug/alcohol abuse, and/or self-harm.

name: Anubis Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX 3050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX 3060Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: In this demo, Anubis, the god of the underworld, will face the strongest army of the God Seth, who invades the desert. Wanting to stop God Seth, Anubis begins to destroy SETh's army, and God RA will help Anubis on this journey. However, Anubis will face Seth's God-Killer, the giant desert worm.
